Connectivity.comm: Router's wireless portion is unreliable with frequent disconnects.

cont.entity_a: Wireless connection drops frequently due to interference.
cont.entity_b: Marvel chipset bug causes Wi-Fi network crashes with Android devices.

cont.entity_a: Router occasionally requires rebooting due to overheating.
cont.entity_b: Router stops broadcasting on 2.4 GHz, requiring frequent reboots.

Setup.comm: Router is easy to set up.

cont.entity_a: Setup was simple and worked flawlessly after initial setup.
cont.entity_b: Router is easy to manage with a user-friendly app.
Router is compatible with open-source firmware like DD-WRT.

cont.entity_a: Router has good security features like 256-bit WEP and MAC filtering.
cont.entity_b: Router supports VPN with easy firmware modification.

Performance.comm: Router manages multiple devices well with strong performance.

cont.entity_a: Router provides good range and connection stability.
cont.entity_b: Router's wireless performance is poor with gigabit internet.

Interface.comm: Router is easy to set up with a good interface.

cont.entity_b: Setup wizard has issues with static corporate WAN links.

cont.entity_a: Router occasionally requires rebooting due to overheating.
cont.entity_b: Router has overheating issues causing emissions.

cont.entity_a: Router provides excellent value and is easy to install and configure.
Router provides strong signal and good range.
